assessment_item.subject: Botany
assessment_item.title: LCMMQK-Q2-வளர்ச்சியின் பண்புகளாக உள்ளது எது?
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

வளர்ச்சியின் பண்புகளாக உள்ளது எது?                                             

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

மாறக்கூடியது 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1608"},{"text":"

பின்னோக்கி ஒரே பக்கமாக வளர்தல்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1609"},{"text":"

முன்னோக்கி ஒரே பக்கமாக வளர்தல்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1619"},{"text":"

ஏதுமில்லை  

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1624"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"LCMMQK-Q2-வளர்ச்சியின் பண்புகளாக உள்ளது எது?","title":"LCMMQK-Q2-வளர்ச்சியின் பண்புகளாக உள்ளது எது?","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Botany","qlevel":"EASY","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
